app.name: TWWHDR
app.long_description:
A randomizer for The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker HD.
Currently allows randomization of most item locations and entrances. In the future, it should support further customization and more randomization options.
Huge thanks to csunday95 and gymnast86! Source code at https://github.com/SuperDude88/TWWHD-Randomizer
